title: Oracle sued by bondholders over losses tied to AI buildout
description: Oracle was sued on Wednesday by bondholders who say they suffered losses because the company led by billionaire Larry Ellison failed to disclose it needed to sell significant additional debt to build out its artificial intelligence infrastructure.

title: Airbnb names Meta’s head of generative AI as Chief Technology Officer
description: Airbnb Inc. has hired a former Meta Platforms Inc. executive as its new chief technology officer, as the short-term rental company is investing to include more artificial intelligence and personalization elements into its service this year.

title: Google Gemini can proactively analyze users’ Gmail, photos, searches
description: Alphabet Inc.'s Google said its Gemini artificial intelligence assistant can now proactively tap into users' data across Gmail, Search, Photos and YouTube, an attempt to make its consumer-facing AI product more personalized.
content: (Bloomberg/Chris Welch) — Alphabet Inc.’s Google said its Gemini artificial intelligence assistant can now proactively tap into users’ data across Gmail, Search, Photos and YouTube, an attempt to make its consumer-facing AI product more personalized.... [2919 chars]

title: Perfume, Power and the Algorithm of Emotion
description: Today, in an age ruled by artificial intelligence and data analytics, emotion remains the last frontier untouched by automation.

title: Keonics to roll out Keo PC from Feb, eyes other states to expand supply
description: Bengaluru: The govt plans to roll out Keo PC, Karnataka's home-grown affordable personal computer with artificial intelligence integration, in the fir.
content: Bengaluru: The govt plans to roll out Keo PC, Karnataka's home-grown affordable personal computer with artificial intelligence integration, in the first week of Feb, with 2,000 units earmarked for distribution to govt schools and hostels. Priced at R... [3020 chars]

title: McDonald's bets on AI in 2026 to fix a major problem
description: McDonald's is expanding artificial intelligence in 2026 to solve one of its biggest problems.
content:
Many consumers may relate to the stressful experience of ordering at fast-food drive-thrus. After visiting multiple fast-food locations over the years and hearing shared complaints, the same issues persist.

title: US, European regulators set principles for 'good AI practice' in drug development
description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration and the European Medicines Agency jointly issued principles for safe and responsible use of artificial intelligence in developing medicines, aiming to speed up innovation while safeguarding patients.

title: AI is boosting scientific careers but shrinking studies
description: Artificial intelligence could be good for scientists but bad for science as a whole, a study has found, as it narrows the scope of research.
content:
Scientists who use artificial intelligence tools publish three times as many papers and climb the academic ranks more than a year faster than peers who do not use the technology.
But AI could be having a detrimental impact on scientific research as t... [2486 chars]
